sentences.en: A control block containing information related to sensor I / O operations.
sentences.cn: 一种含有与传感器输入输出操作有关信息的控制块.

sentences.en: A minim moisture content sensor for SF 6 gas measure on - line was studied.
sentences.cn: 研制了一种在线式SF6气体微水含量检测传感器.

sentences.en: A positive movement from the sensor will cause an inward movement of the diaphragm.
sentences.cn: 来自传感器的正向运动将导致膜片向内运动.

sentences.en: Actually, the biometric sensor doesn't read the iris.
sentences.cn: 事实上, 生物感应器不会读取虹膜.

sentences.en: Another ambient temperature sensor is the vapor - filled bellows.
sentences.cn: 另一种空气温度传感器是充气波纹管.

sentences.en: He perfected a flux - gate sensor in 1941.
sentences.cn: 他在1941年制成了一台磁通脉冲传感器.

sentences.en: He plugged the sensor into a outlet.
sentences.cn: 他把传感器插进电源插座.

sentences.en: If you buy a drier, look for one with a sensor which switches off when clothes are dry.
sentences.cn: 你若要买烘干机，找一台带感应器的，可以在衣服干的时候自动断电。

sentences.en: My sensor indicates human presence 50 meters above the ground.
sentences.cn: 探测器显示有人在地面50米以上.

sentences.en: Sensor sweeps reveal many advanced cities and ion energy signatures.
sentences.cn: 传感器扫描,发现许多先进的城市和离子能量信号.

sentences.en: Set - off memory; Warning for: set - off, fan, sensor, over box inner temp.
sentences.cn: 断电 记忆功能: 五功能报警:温度上下偏差 、 传感器、断电 、 风机 、 箱温超温.

sentences.en: The bimetal element is the simplest and most often encountered sensor.
sentences.cn: 双金属元件是一种最简单和最常见的传感器.

sentences.en: The gauge relies upon a sensor in the tank to relay the fuel level.
sentences.cn: 油表靠油箱里的感应器来显示燃料的液位。

sentences.en: The latest Japanese vacuum cleaners contain sensors that detect the amount of dust and type of floor.
sentences.cn: 日本最新款吸尘器装有传感器，能测出灰尘量和地板类型。

sentences.en: The temperature sensor is enclosed in a protective well.
sentences.cn: 温度传感器密封在保护套管中.

sentences.en: The temperature sensor is making the computer think the engine is cold when, in fact, it's hot.
sentences.cn: 温度传感器发给计算机的信息为发动机是冷却的，可实际上它的温度很高。

words.tran_cn: 轰动的；耸人听闻的；非常好的；使人感动的
感觉的；知觉的；传递感觉的
感觉，官能；观念；道理；理智

phrases.tran_cn: 湿敏组件，湿度传感器；湿度传感器

压力传感器；位置传感器
感测器阵列；阵列传感器

trans.tran_en: a piece of equipment used for discovering the presence of light, heat, movement etc
